I hope you people who think you hear or see better then the actually person=
 who is doing theres session, realize you may have manage to run the person=
 who is responsible for the group. I don't understand why time and time aga=
in someone has to say something negative or call themselves teaching the te=
acher so to speak..not just to..You guys do this to Steve,me when I post(th=
at why i hardly do) what makes you so special that you hear better then the=
 person who made the file?? I don't understand this...why can't you listen =
and you can't hear it move the hell on..to correct someones file is rude!

=
=C2=A0

--- On Thu, 12/30/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wr=
ote:


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: The case for faces.
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, Dec=
ember 30, 2010, 2:44 PM


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0It not just you, everyone wants=
 everything handed to them, no thinking, no work. They just want an excuse =
not to question anything so they can go on playing video games, watching mo=
vies and ignoring how bad the world really is. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0There=
=C2=A0is not even any discussion possible, not here, not=C2=A0on FB, not an=
ywhere. Everyone wants the same precanned BS from what they invision as aut=
horities. Just make it all go away so y'all can completely ignore all reali=
ty. Ya don't have to question, ya don't have think, ya don't have to seek a=
ny answers.=C2=A0 I'm done.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S


On Thu, Dec 30, 2010 at 1:48=
 AM, Adrienne <abortree@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 








--- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I'm thinki=
ng there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech, and
> not just=
 EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living or
> dead), =
the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes
> and=
 also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in
> =
person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded.
> 
> I know, it's not =
ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to think.
> I think most want th=
is stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all
> rules and protocols =
known, but it just won't stay in one box, or universe
> for that matter.
> =

> Frank-S
>
Dear Frank,

I think that I see what you mean. I mean no offen=
se, but I it would be helpful to see something a little more definitive tha=
t couldn't be mistaken for matrixing. Is this possible? Is it just me?

- A=
drienne
